column3: Net sales in the U.S. to third parties totaled $10,362, $9,848 and $9,285 in 2023, 2022 and 2021, respectively. No other individual country's net sales exceeds 10 percent of total net sales.

Other (income) and expense, net in 2023 includes the gain of $74 related to the sale of our Brazil tissue and K-C Professional business, and in 2022 includes the non-cash, non-recurring gain of $85 related to the acquisition of a controlling interest in Thinx.
Segment operating profit excludes Other (income) and expense, net and income and expenses not associated with the business segments.
